description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the BitLocker security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-38058), apply the relevant updates for your system.

1. Identify your Windows version and system architecture.
2. Download and apply the appropriate KB update from the following links:
   - Windows 11 Versions: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses the BitLocker security feature bypass that could allow attackers to circumvent security protections.
- Ensure your system is updated to the prescribed build numbers listed in the context for optimal effectiveness.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
